attributes.title: The absolute worst app imaginable
attributes.review: The Cheeto puff we elected four years ago is still the very same Cheeto puff today. Do yourself a favor by not downloading this app unless your soul purpose in life is to be an utter disappointment to the human race.

attributes.title: Black lives matter 🥰
attributes.review: This app is horrible I do not recommend downloading it at all. It made my phone glitch and I had to buy a brand new phone.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🙄
attributes.review: It took FOREVER to load and it was so glitchy I couldn’t even be on it this app needs to be took down👎

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: this app just made all of his supporters look terrible because it showed me how bad of a person, and leader he would be 0/10 would NEVER use again👎🏾

attributes.title: horrific
attributes.review: it’s horrible this president stands against everything America should delete this 😡😡😡😡 it glitches and every time a read the word trump I thought of a rasict and a rapist and the world Dosent need that negative vibe or leader so 0/10

attributes.title: Awful, garbage, trash
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy it would break down every time I opened it. Very unhelpful; and traumatic to look at. Do not download this app, it is horrible and a waste of time.

attributes.title: Very buggy and filled with fake news
attributes.review: The app needs a lot of work and everything on there is fake news

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: This app is so so bad I didn’t leave me alone when I said I don’t want to receive notifications it’s horrible I would rather burn my phone then use this appp

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: It was difficult for me to navigate the app. Also the person that this app is based on, is a racist, anti-lgbtq+, ableist, sexist, islamophobic, xenophobic (the list goes on) Cheeto, which makes it even harder to actually like the app

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I had to delete and download it five times for this thing to work. Took hours to load a single page and it gave my device a VIRUS. It also asked for my personal information. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP FOR YOUR INTERNET SAFETY
